item.title: Best Camping Chairs (2025): Snow Peak, Kelty, Helinox, and More
item.description: Whether you’re hiking, tailgating, or relaxing in the garden, take the weight off in style with these WIRED-tested chairs for the great outdoors.

item.title: Why Janicza Bravo Wants to Be Her ‘Too Much’ Character When She Grows Up
item.description: The actor also talks about directing the show’s big wedding episode, what she really thinks of Zev and the best thing she ate while working on season four of ‘The Bear.’
